fieldUpdates.description: look at hour opty was created and fill in the Created Bucket Time field Assumes Eastern time zone. Allows for daylight savings time between March 1 and Oct 31. Used for Case #21750204
fieldUpdates.formula: IF(AND(MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate ))>2, MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate ))<11),"Bucket " & TEXT(FLOOR ( MOD( CreatedDate - ($System.OriginDateTime + 4/24),1) *24)), "Bucket " & TEXT(FLOOR ( MOD( CreatedDate - ($System.OriginDateTime + 5/24),1) *24)))
fieldUpdates.name: Bucket Create Time

fieldUpdates.description: Clear the Event Id so it doesn't hit this condition by default next time it runs.

fieldUpdates.description: Clear this field after the email is sent.

rules.fullName: CORE%2C MMS%2C and HRS Not Sold
rules.description: To create an activity when stage is changed by Rep to Not Sold for Presentation reporting
rules.formula: AND( OR(ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(StageName) , "Referred"), ISPICKVAL ( PRIORVALUE(StageName), "Pending"), ISPICKVAL ( PRIORVALUE(StageName), "Qualified - Pending")), (ISPICKVAL(StageName , "Not Sold")))

rules.description: When stage is moved to Sold, an activity will be created for Presentation reporting.

rules.fullName: CORE%2C MMS%2C and HRS Sold - Submitted
rules.description: To create an activity when stage is changed by DSA to Sold-Submitted for Presentation reporting
When a commissioned Opp is cloned and the rep does not change the Close Date then it will be changed to 30 days from today
When a commissioned Opp is cloned and the rep does not change the stage, then it will be changed to Pending
When stage is moved to Sold-Started or Sold-Submitted from Pending, an activity will be created for Presentation reporting. Rule applies to Core Sales Org only
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName), "Pending"), (OR(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Sold - Started"), ISPICKVAL (StageName,"Sold - Submitted"))))

rules.description: When a person with the KAS Profile creates an MMS opportunity, default the status to Create - Received.
rules.formula: CreatedBy.Profile.Name = 'KAS Profile' && RecordTypeId = '012300000000hQQ' && NOT( ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Create - Received'))

rules.description: Populates the Bank Lead Id field.

rules.fullName: HRS 60 Day After Close Date Notification

criteriaItems.value: HRS 401(k) Opportunity FSS Record Type,HRS 401(k) Opportunity Record Type,HRS 401(k) Referral Revenue Opportunity Rep,HRS PEO-ASO Opportunity FSS Record Type,HRS PEO-ASO Opportunity Record Type,HRS PEO-ASO Referral Revenue Opportunity
Sold Not Submitted - Pick Up Scheduled

rules.description: To create an activity when stage is changed by Rep to Sold-Not Submitted for Presentation reporting

rules.fullName: Merchant Services Payment Support Information Email

rules.description:
Notifcation for the Opportunity owner when the To Be Deleted checkbox is unchecked by a System Admin.
On 3/15/13 FLurz changed the Email Alert from Opportunity Can Not Be Deleted to Core Opportunity Can Not Be Deleted per Case #11024720.

rules.fullName: PEOC Oppty Not a PEO Candidate
rules.description: When PEOC Opportunity is Not Sold with Reason Won/Lost Not a PEO Candidate

criteriaItems.value: Core Opportunity DSA Record Type,Payment Processing (DSA) Opportunity,Payment Processing Opportunity,Core Virtual Sales

rules.description: Will create three follow up tasks for Core reps when their opportunity is coded Sold-Started, from the run-effective-date
send email to submitting employee when SOAR opportunity owner changes
rules.formula: AND( OR( IsPickVal( LeadSource,'Referral-Client-SOAR-New'), IsPickVal( LeadSource,'Referral-Client-SOAR-Additional ID'), IsPickVal( LeadSource,'Referral-Client-SOAR-Additional Product'), IsPickVal( LeadSource,'Referral - Internal - SOAR') ), Not(IsBlank( Referring_Employee__c)), Not(ISNULL(OwnerId)), ISCHANGED(OwnerId))

rules.description: send email to submitting employee when SOAR referral opportunity status changes to Sold case #23812738 changed to exclude HNBF rcd type
rules.formula: OR(IsPickVal( LeadSource,'Referral-Client-SOAR-New'), IsPickVal( LeadSource,'Referral-Client-SOAR-Additional ID'), IsPickVal( LeadSource,'Referral-Client-SOAR-Additional Product'), IsPickVal( LeadSource,'Referral - Internal - SOAR') ) && Not(IsBlank( Referring_Employee__c)) && (OR(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Sold') , ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Sold - Submitted to CTT')) && $RecordType.Name <> 'HNBF Opportunity Record Type' && $RecordType.Name <> 'HNBF Opportunity DSA Record Type' && IsBlank( SOAR_Region__c ))

rules.description: send email to submitting employee when SOAR referral opportunity status changes to Sold case #23812738 changed for HNBF rcd type but not Health Insurance
rules.formula: OR(IsPickVal( LeadSource,'Referral-Client-SOAR-New'), IsPickVal( LeadSource,'Referral-Client-SOAR-Additional ID'), IsPickVal( LeadSource,'Referral-Client-SOAR-Additional Product'), IsPickVal( LeadSource,'Referral - Internal - SOAR') ) && Not(IsBlank( Referring_Employee__c)) && ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Sold - Submitted') && OR($RecordType.Name = 'HNBF Opportunity Record Type', $RecordType.Name = 'HNBF Opportunity DSA Record Type') && NOT(IsPickVal( SOAR_referral_products__c,'Health Insurance')) && IsBlank( SOAR_Region__c )

rules.fullName: SOAR Opty Status Change Health Insurance
rules.description: send email to submitting employee when SOAR referral opportunity status changes to Sold case #23812738 changed for HNBF rcd type and Health Insurance
rules.formula: OR(IsPickVal( LeadSource,'Referral-Client-SOAR-New'), IsPickVal( LeadSource,'Referral-Client-SOAR-Additional ID'), IsPickVal( LeadSource,'Referral-Client-SOAR-Additional Product'), IsPickVal( LeadSource,'Referral - Internal - SOAR') ) && Not(IsBlank( Referring_Employee__c)) && ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Sold - Submitted') && OR($RecordType.Name = 'HNBF Opportunity Record Type', $RecordType.Name = 'HNBF Opportunity DSA Record Type') && IsPickVal( SOAR_referral_products__c,'Health Insurance') && IsBlank( SOAR_Region__c )

rules.fullName: SOAR Opty Status Change to SP
rules.description: send email to SharePoint when SOAR referral opportunity status changes to Sold
rules.formula: OR(IsPickVal( LeadSource,'Referral-Client-SOAR-New'),IsPickVal( LeadSource,'Referral-Client-SOAR-Additional ID'), IsPickVal( LeadSource,'Referral-Client-SOAR-Additional Product'), IsPickVal( LeadSource,'Referral - Internal - SOAR') ) && Not(IsBlank( Referring_Employee__c)) && (OR(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Sold') ,ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Sold - Submitted to CTT')) && Not(IsBlank( SOAR_Id__c )))

rules.description: send email to submitting employee when SOAR referral opportunity status changes to Lost
rules.formula: OR(IsPickVal( LeadSource,'Referral-Client-SOAR-Additional ID'),IsPickVal( LeadSource,'Referral-Client-SOAR-Additional Product'),IsPickVal( LeadSource,'Referral-Client-SOAR-New')) && Not(IsBlank(Referring_Employee__c))&& (OR(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Lost'),ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'No Decision'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Disqualified'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Rescinded')))

criteriaItems.value: HRS 401(k) Opportunity Record Type,HRS 401(k) Opportunity FSS Record Type

rules.description: case #25572640 - if Opty is HRS 401(k) record type and Account.401k Record Keeper is New Plan, check box on Opty
update historical SLD Revenue field when bank lead/oppty is sold
